TEXT.French: Des Mercenaires sans pitié nous ont contacté et ont proféré des menaces : Ils demandent 200 or de notre trésor, ou ils nous attaqueront.
TEXT.German: Gewissenlose Söldner erscheinen mit einer Drohung vor Dir: Sie verlangen 200 Gold aus unserem Staatsschatz oder sie werden uns angreifen.
TEXT.Italian: Ruthless mercanaries approach you with a threat: They demand 200 gold from our treasury and if not given, they'll attack us.
TEXT.Spanish: Ruthless mercanaries approach you with a threat: They demand 200 gold from our treasury and if not given, they'll attack us.

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Un nombre important de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Guerries avec Hache[COLOR_REVERT] est apparu près de nos frontières.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Eine gefährliche Anzahl an Söldner-[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Axtkämpfern[COLOR_REVERT] ist an unserer Grenze erschienen.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]A dangerous number of mercenary [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Axeman[COLOR_REVERT] units have spawned near our border.

TEXT.Spanish: Bribe the mercenaries with extra gold to join our armies.

TEXT.English: Band of mercenaries have gathered an army and their swordsmen seek to plunder civilizations.
TEXT.French: Une Bande de mercenaires a recruté une armée et leurs Spadassins sont impatients de piller !
TEXT.German: Eine Bande aus Söldnern hat eine Armee gegründet und ihre Schwertkämpfer wollen nun Zivilisationen plündern.
TEXT.Italian: Band of mercenaries have gathered an army and their swordsmen seek to plunder civilizations.
TEXT.Spanish: Band of mercenaries have gathered an army and their swordsmen seek to plunder civilizations.

TEXT.English: Ruthless mercanaries approach you with a threat: They demand 300 gold from our treasury and if not given, they'll attack us.
TEXT.French: Des Mercenaires sans pitié nous ont contacté et ont proféré des menaces : Ils demandent 300 or de notre trésor, ou ils nous attaqueront.
TEXT.German: Gewissenlose Söldner erscheinen mit einer Drohung vor Dir: Sie verlangen 300 Gold aus unserem Staatsschatz oder sie werden uns angreifen.
TEXT.Italian: Ruthless mercanaries approach you with a threat: They demand 300 gold from our treasury and if not given, they'll attack us.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]A dangerous number of mercenary [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT] units have spawned near our border.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Un nombre important de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spadassins[COLOR_REVERT] mercenaires est apparu près de nos frontières.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Eine gefährliche Anzahl an Söldner-[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Schwertkämpfern[COLOR_REVERT] ist an unserer Grenze erschienen.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]A dangerous number of mercenary [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT] units have spawned near our border.

TEXT.Italian: Give them the gold so our cities can continue to live peacefully.

TEXT.French: Donnez-leur de l'Or, que nos villes puissent vivre en paix.
TEXT.German: Besteche die Söldner mit zusätzlichem Gold, so dass sie sich unseren Armeen anschließen.
TEXT.Italian: Bribe the mercenaries with extra gold to join our armies.
TEXT.Spanish: Bribe the mercenaries with extra gold to join our armies.

TEXT.English: An earthquake near %s2_city has devastated the countryside. Fortunately, the %s1_civ_adjective city itself was spared.
TEXT.French: Un Tremblement de Terre près de %s2_city a dévasté la campagne. Heureusement, la Ville %s1_civ_adjective a été épargnée.
TEXT.German: Ein Erdbeben in der Nähe von %s2_city hat das Land verheert. Zum Glück wurde die Stadt %s1_civ_adjective selbst ausgespart.
TEXT.Italian: An earthquake near %s2_city has devastated the countryside. Fortunately, the %s1_civ_adjective city itself was spared.
TEXT.Spanish: An earthquake near %s2_city has devastated the countryside. Fortunately, the %s1_civ_adjective city itself was spared.

TEXT.English: A very strong earthquake has shaken the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Un Tremblement de Terre très important a secoué la ville %s1_civ_adjective de %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Ein sehr starkes Erdbeben hat die %s1_civ_adjective Stadt %s2_city erschüttert.
TEXT.Italian: A very strong earthquake has shaken the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: A very strong earthquake has shaken the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city.

TEXT.English: An earthquake jolts the city of %s2_city, causing building collapses, landslides and floods.
TEXT.French: Un Tremblement de Terre a secoué la Ville de %s2_city, provoquant l'effondrement de bâtiments, des glissements de terrains et des inondations.
TEXT.German: Ein Erdbeben erschüttert die Stadt %s2_city, dabei stürzen Gebäude ein und es kommt zu Erdrutschen und Überflutungen.
TEXT.Italian: An earthquake jolts the city of %s2_city, causing building collapses, landslides and floods.
TEXT.Spanish: An earthquake jolts the city of %s2_city, causing building collapses, landslides and floods.

TEXT.English: An earthquake over 7.5 in Richter scale has shaken ground near %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Un Tremblement de Terre de plus de 7.5 sur l'échelle de Richter a retenti près de %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Ein Erdbeben von über 7,5 auf der Richter-Skala hat den Grund in der nähe von %s2_city erschüttert.
TEXT.Italian: An earthquake over 7.5 in Richter scale has shaken ground near %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: An earthquake over 7.5 in Richter scale has shaken ground near %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Send what aid we can to the survivors.
TEXT.French: Envoyez toute l'aide possible aux survivants.
TEXT.German: Sende den Überlebende alle Hilfe, die wir bieten können.
TEXT.Italian: Send what aid we can to the survivors.
TEXT.Spanish: Send what aid we can to the survivors.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Suffer loss of plot improvements near the earthquake
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Subir les pertes des aménagements autour de l'épicentre
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Eine Geländemodernisierung in der Nähe des Erdbebens geht verloren
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Suffer loss of plot improvements near the earthquake
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Suffer loss of plot improvements near the earthquake

TEXT.English: A master tanner in the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city has found out that leftover leather can be turned into glue and he's now happy to sell this new product to everyone.
TEXT.French: Un maître tanneur de la Ville %s1_civ_adjective de %s2_city a réussi à utiliser des restes de cuir pour en faire de la colle et est à présent heureux de vendre ce nouveau produit.
TEXT.German: Ein Meistergerber in der %s1_civ_adjective Stadt %s2_city has herausgefunden, dass Lederreste in einen Klebstoff umgewandelt werden können. Er freut sich, dieses neue Produkt an jedermann verkaufen zu können.
TEXT.Italian: A master tanner in the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city has found out that leftover leather can be turned into glue and he's now happy to sell this new product to everyone.
TEXT.Spanish: A master tanner in the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city has found out that leftover leather can be turned into glue and he's now happy to sell this new product to everyone.

TEXT.English: %s2_city has produced a master tanner who has found out that leftover leather can be turned into glue. The local tannery is now selling glue to everyone.
TEXT.French: %s2_city a un maître Tanneur qui a trouvé comment utiliser des restes de cuirs pour en faire de la colle. La tannerie locale vend à présent de la Colle.
TEXT.German: %s2_city hat einen Meistergerber hervorgebracht, dass Lederreste in einen Klebstoff umgewandelt werden können. Die örtliche Gerberei verkauft jetzt Kleber an jedermann.
TEXT.Italian: %s2_city has produced a master tanner who has found out that leftover leather can be turned into glue. The local tannery is now selling glue to everyone.
TEXT.Spanish: %s2_city has produced a master tanner who has found out that leftover leather can be turned into glue. The local tannery is now selling glue to everyone.

TEXT.English: We applaud the accomplishments of our master tanner.
TEXT.French: Nous sommes fiers des accomplissements de notre Tanneur.
TEXT.German: Wir beglückwünschen unseren Meistergerber für seine Errungenschaften.
TEXT.Italian: We applaud the accomplishments of our master tanner.
TEXT.Spanish: We applaud the accomplishments of our master tanner.

TEXT.English: A plague of locusts have swarmed over a Farm near %s2_city, destroying all the crops there.
TEXT.French: une invasion d'acridiens a déferlé dans une ferme près de %s2_city, détruisant tous les champs.
TEXT.German: Ein Heuschreckenschwarm fällt über eine Farm in der Nähe von %s2_city her und zerstört alle Feldfrüchte.
TEXT.Italian: A plague of locusts have swarmed over a Farm near %s2_city, destroying all the crops there.
TEXT.Spanish: A plague of locusts have swarmed over a Farm near %s2_city, destroying all the crops there.

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective Melee units are now deployed with new, segmented armors, improving their defense versus Archery units.
TEXT.French: Des unités de combat rapproché %s1_civ_adjective sont à présent déployées avec de nouvelles armures augmentant leur défense contre les unité d'archers.
TEXT.German: %s1_civ_adjective Nahkampfeinheiten werden jetzt mit neuen, segmentierten Panzern ausgestattet und verbessern somit ihre Verteigung gegenüber Bogenschützen.
TEXT.Italian: %s1_civ_adjective Melee units are now deployed with new, segmented armors, improving their defense versus Archery units.
TEXT.Spanish: %s1_civ_adjective Melee units are now deployed with new, segmented armors, improving their defense versus Archery units.

TEXT.English: Invention of the segmented armor has provided our foot soldiers with some protection against archers.
TEXT.French: L'Invention d'armures segmentées permet à nos troupes à pied une meilleure protection contre les archers.
TEXT.German: Die Erfindung von segmentiertem Panzer hat unseren Fußsoldaten einen gewissen Schutz gegenüber Bogenschützen gegeben.
TEXT.Italian: Invention of the segmented armor has provided our foot soldiers with some protection against archers.
TEXT.Spanish: Invention of the segmented armor has provided our foot soldiers with some protection against archers.

TEXT.English: Issue segmented armors to our troops as supplies permit.
TEXT.French: Délivrer des armures segmentées à nos troupes tant que c'est possible.
TEXT.German: Gebe unseren Truppen segmentierten Panzer solange der Vorrat reicht.
TEXT.Italian: Issue segmented armors to our troops as supplies permit.
TEXT.Spanish: Issue segmented armors to our troops as supplies permit.

TEXT.English: A master smith has developed techniques that improve the strength of all %s1_civ_adjective naval cannons.
TEXT.French: Un maître fondeur a développé des techniques permettant d'améliorer la puissance des canons navals %s1_civ_adjective.
TEXT.German: Ein Meisterschmied hat eine Technik entwickelt, um die Stärke von allen %s1_civ_adjective Seekanonen zu erhöhen.
TEXT.Italian: A master smith has developed techniques that improve the strength of all %s1_civ_adjective naval cannons.
TEXT.Spanish: A master smith has developed techniques that improve the strength of all %s1_civ_adjective naval cannons.

TEXT.English: A master smith has crafted a new type of naval ammunition formed of two balls chained together that can be used to shoot down yards and masts from other ships.
TEXT.French: Un maître fondeur a mis au point un nouveau type de munition navale formée de deux boulets enchaînés ensemble, qui améliore considérablement les dégâts sur les installations portuaires et les autres navires.
TEXT.German: Ein Meisterschmied hat einen neuen Typ Munition erfunden, der aus zwei zusammengeketteten Kugeln besteht mit denen man Masten von anderen Schiffen herunterschießen kann.
TEXT.Italian: A master smith has crafted a new type of naval ammunition formed of two balls chained together that can be used to shoot down yards and masts from other ships.
TEXT.Spanish: > master smith has crafted a new type of naval ammunition formed of two balls chained together that can be used to shoot down yards and masts from other ships.

TEXT.English: We will fit all of our naval ships with the new ammunition type.
TEXT.French: Nous allons équiper tous nos navires de ces nouvelles munitions.
TEXT.German: We werden alle unsere Kriegsschiffe mit der neuen Munition ausrüsten
TEXT.Italian: We will fit all of our naval ships with the new ammunition type.
TEXT.Spanish: We will fit all of our naval ships with the new ammunition type.

TEXT.English: A master engineer has developed a new ammunition technique that improve the strength of all %s1_civ_adjective cannons.
TEXT.French: Un maître en armement a développé une nouvelle technique pour améliorer la puissance des canons %s1_civ_adjective.
TEXT.German: Ein Meisteringenieur hat eine neue Munition entwickelt, die die Stärke von allen %s1_civ_adjective Kanonen erhöht.
TEXT.Italian: A master engineer has developed a new ammunition technique that improve the strength of all %s1_civ_adjective cannons.
TEXT.Spanish: A master engineer has developed a new ammunition technique that improve the strength of all %s1_civ_adjective cannons.

TEXT.English: A master engineer has crafted a new type of anti-personnel ammunition that can be used in cannons. Instead of solid shot, a mass of loosely packed metal slugs is loaded into a canvas bag. When assembled, the balls resemble a cluster of grapes and when fired the balls spread out from the muzzle at high velocity.
TEXT.French: Un maître en armement a conçu un nouveau type de munitions anti-personnel qui peuvent être utilisées dans nos canons. A la place d'un boulet solide, celui-ci crache une masse de petits éclats de métal placé dans un filet. Lorsque ces munitions sont tirées, elles atteignent leur cible à grande vitesse et provoque des dégâts dévastateurs.
TEXT.German: Ein Meister ingenieur hat eine Form von Munition entwickelt, die in Kanonen gegen Soldaten verwendet werden kann. Statt einer soliden Kugel wird eine Menge locker zusammengepackter Metallklumpen in ein Segeltuch gepackt. Diese Verteilen sich nach dem Abfeuern in großer Geschwindigkeit in viele kleine Kügelchen.
TEXT.Italian: A master engineer has crafted a new type of anti-personnel ammunition that can be used in cannons. Instead of solid shot, a mass of loosely packed metal slugs is loaded into a canvas bag. When assembled, the balls resemble a cluster of grapes and when fired the balls spread out from the muzzle at high velocity.
TEXT.Spanish: A master engineer has crafted a new type of anti-personnel ammunition that can be used in cannons. Instead of solid shot, a mass of loosely packed metal slugs is loaded into a canvas bag. When assembled, the balls resemble a cluster of grapes and when fired the balls spread out from the muzzle at high velocity.

TEXT.English: We will fit all of our siege units with the new ammunition type.
TEXT.French: Nous allons équiper toutes nos armes de siège de ce nouveau type de munitions.
TEXT.German: Alle unsere Belagerungswaffen werden mit der neuen Munition ausgestattet.
TEXT.Italian: We will fit all of our siege units with the new ammunition type.
TEXT.Spanish: We will fit all of our siege units with the new ammunition type.

TEXT.English: Rumors abound that %s1_civ_adjective shipmasters are doing extensive refitting work on their entire fleet.
TEXT.French: Des rumeurs ont fait état de travaux intensifs des bateliers %s1_civ_adjective sur toute leur flotte.
TEXT.German: Gerüchte besagen, dass die %s1_civ_adjective Schiffbauer die komplette Flotte neu ausrüsten.
TEXT.Italian: Rumors abound that %s1_civ_adjective shipmasters are doing extensive refitting work on their entire fleet.
TEXT.Spanish: Rumors abound that %s1_civ_adjective shipmasters are doing extensive refitting work on their entire fleet.

TEXT.English: Our shipmasters have devised a way to add copper plates to the hulls of our ships. This will help with both ramming and being rammed. The ship hulls will also resist cannonball hits longer.
TEXT.French: Nos bateliers ont trouvé un moyen de renforcer les coques des navires avec des plaques de cuivre. Ces modifications vont nous donner l'avantage dans le pillonage des navires ennemis.
TEXT.German: Unsere Schiffbauer haben einen Weg gefunden, um Kupferplatten am Rumpf unsere Schiffe anzubringen. Dies wird bei Rammstößen und auch bei Kanonenbeschuss helfen.
TEXT.Italian: Our shipmasters have devised a way to add copper plates to the hulls of our ships. This will help with both ramming and being rammed. The ship hulls will also resist cannonball hits longer.
TEXT.Spanish: Our shipmasters have devised a way to add copper plates to the hulls of our ships. This will help with both ramming and being rammed. The ship hulls will also resist cannonball hits longer.

TEXT.English: Our existing ships can also be refitted? Begin immediately.
TEXT.French: Nos navires actuels peuvent être modifiés ? Commencez immédiatement.
TEXT.German: Unsere vorhanden Schiffe können auch damit aufgerüstet werden? Beginnt sofort damit.
TEXT.Italian: Possiamo migliorare le nostre navi? Cominciate immediatamente.
TEXT.Spanish: ¿Nuestros barcos actuales también pueden beneficiarse de esta mejora? Que se haga de inmediato.

TEXT.English: A %s4_civ_adjective assassin has been dicovered in the %s1_civ_adjective capital.
TEXT.French: Un assassin %s4_civ_adjective a été démasqué dans la capitale %s1_civ_adjective.
TEXT.German: Ein %s4_civ_adjective Attentäter wurde in der %s1_civ_adjective Hauptstadt entdeckt.
TEXT.Italian: A %s4_civ_adjective assassin has been dicovered in the %s1_civ_adjective capital.
TEXT.Spanish: A %s4_civ_adjective assassin has been dicovered in the %s1_civ_adjective capital.

TEXT.English: A %s1_civ_adjective assassin is operating in our capital! What should we do?
TEXT.French: Un Assassin %s1_civ_adjective opère actuellemtn dans notre capitale ! Que devons-nous faire?
TEXT.German: Ein %s1_civ_adjective Attentäter wurde in unserer Hauptstadt gesichtet. Was sollen wir tun?
TEXT.Italian: A %s1_civ_adjective assassin is operating in our capital! What should we do?
TEXT.Spanish: A %s1_civ_adjective assassin is operating in our capital! What should we do?

TEXT.English: Be discreet. Offer the to release the assassin to their government, but question him first.
TEXT.French: Soyez discret. Rendez-le à son pays, mais interrogez-le d'abord.
TEXT.German: Sei diskret. Bitte die Auslieferung des Attentäters an sein Heimatland an, aber verhöre ihn zuerst.
TEXT.Italian: Be discreet. Offer the to release the assassin to their government, but question him first.
TEXT.Spanish: Be discreet. Offer the to release the assassin to their government, but question him first.

TEXT.English: Every man has his price. His skills could make him a very valuable asset.
TEXT.French: Personne n'est incorruptible. Ses connaissances pourraient nous etre précieuses.
TEXT.German: Jedermann ist käuflich. Dieser Spion könnte uns noch nützlich sein.
TEXT.Italian: Ogni uomo ha un suo prezzo. Le sue conoscenze potrebbero tornarci molto utili.
TEXT.Spanish: Todo el mundo tiene su precio. Su conocimiento puede hacerle un recurso muy valioso.

TEXT.English: That is an act of war! Clearly, our people and military contractors will rise to the occasion!
TEXT.French: C'est une déclaration de guerre! Il est évident que notre peuple et nos fournisseurs militaires sauront profiter de cette occasion!
TEXT.German: Dieser Vorfall ist ein kriegerischer Akt! Die Empörung wird das Volk in Rage versetzen und zu Höchstleistungen antreiben.
TEXT.Italian: Questo è un atto di guerra! Certamente, i nostri cittadini reagiranno duramente alla notizia e i contractor militari vorranno approfittare di questa occasione!
TEXT.Spanish: Esto es un acto de guerra! Obviamente, nuestro pueblo y contratistas militares estaran a la altura!

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Receive %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT][NUM1:Axeman:Axemen][COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Recevoir %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT][NUM1:Guerrier:Guerriers] avec Hache[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Erhalte %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT][NUM1:Axeman:Axemen][COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Receive %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT][NUM1:Axeman:Axemen][COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Receive %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT][NUM1:Axeman:Axemen][COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: Our harbormasters request government aid in expanding our overseas trading empire.[PARAGRAPH:1]We will need to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ports[COLOR_REVERT] in our cities and construct enough ocean worthy ships.
TEXT.French: Nos maîtres des ports demandent au gouvernement une aide pour développer les échanges commerciaux outremer.[PARAGRAPH:1]Nous devons construire suffisamment de [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ports[COLOR_REVERT] dans nos Ville ainsi que des navires capables d'affronter les océans.
TEXT.German: Unsere Hafenmeister verlangen Hilfe bei der Expansion unseres Handelsimperiums in Übersee.[PARAGRAPH:1]Wir müssen genügend [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Seehäfen[COLOR_REVERT] in unseren Städten bauen und genügend ozeantaugliche Schiffe.
TEXT.Italian: Our harbormasters request government aid in expanding our overseas trading empire.[PARAGRAPH:1]We will need to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ports[COLOR_REVERT] in our cities and construct enough ocean worthy ships.
TEXT.Spanish: Our harbormasters request government aid in expanding our overseas trading empire.[PARAGRAPH:1]We will need to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ports[COLOR_REVERT] in our cities and construct enough ocean worthy ships.

TEXT.English: The Harbormaster[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your merchant marine industry to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ports[COLOR_REVERT] for them to become the undisputed trading kings of the sea. You will also need to build a fleet of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT] to help carry cargo across deep water.
TEXT.French: Le Maître du Port[PARAGRAPH:1]Vous êtes chargé par la Marine marchande de construire suffisamment de [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ports[COLOR_REVERT] pour qu'elle puisse devenir la plus importante au monde. Il vous faut également construire une flotte de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravelles[COLOR_REVERT] pour nous permettre de transporter les marchandises en eaux profondes.
TEXT.German: Der Hafenmeister[PARAGRAPH:1]Deine Handelsmarine beauftragt Dich genügend [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Seehäfen[COLOR_REVERT] für sie zu bauen, um die angefochtenen Handelskönige der See zu werden. Du wirst auch eine Flotte von [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Karavellen[COLOR_REVERT] bauen müssen, um Fracht über die Tiefsee zu transportieren.
TEXT.Italian: The Harbormaster[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your merchant marine industry to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ports[COLOR_REVERT] for them to become the undisputed trading kings of the sea. You will also need to build a fleet of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT] to help carry cargo across deep water.
TEXT.Spanish: The Harbormaster[PARAGRAPH:1]You are tasked by your merchant marine industry to build enough [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ports[COLOR_REVERT] for them to become the undisputed trading kings of the sea. You will also need to build a fleet of [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT] to help carry cargo across deep water.

TEXT.English: The seaworthy %s1_civ_adjective people have completed the quest of The Harbormaster!
TEXT.French: Le peuple %s1_civ_adjective au pied marin a achevé la quête du Maître du port !
TEXT.German: Das seefahrende %s1:3_civ_adjective Volk hat den Quest "Der Hafenmeister" erfüllt!
TEXT.Italian: Il popolo marinaro %s1_civ_adjective ha completato l'impresa dell'Armatore!
TEXT.Spanish: Los %s1:3_civ_adjective han hecho gala de su pericia naval completando la misión El práctico del puerto.

TEXT.English: Congratulations! You have met the goals of your merchant marine and built for them enough ships and docks to empower their plans. Please choose a reward from among the benefits your new trading empire is able to provide to you.
TEXT.French: Félicitations ! Vous avez atteint les objectifs de votre marine marchande et lui avez construit suffisamment de navires et de ports pour qu'elle réalise ses projets. Veuillez choisir une récompense parmi les avantages que votre nouvel empire commercial peut vous procurer.
TEXT.German: Glückwunsch! Sie haben die Forderungen Ihrer Handelsmarine erfüllt und genug Schiffe und Häfen gebaut, um ihre Pläne durchzuführen. Wählen Sie eine Belohnung aus den Vorteilen aus, die Ihr neues Handelsimperium Ihnen bieten kann.
TEXT.Italian: Congratulazioni! Hai raggiunto gli obiettivi della tua marina mercantile, costruendo abbastanza navi e porti per mettere in atto i loro piani. Scegli una ricompensa tra quelle messe a disposizione dal tuo nuovo impero commerciale.
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Felicidades! Se han cumplido los objetivos de la marina mercante y se han construido los barcos y puertos necesarios para desarrollar sus planes. Elegid una de las recompensas que vuestro nuevo imperio comercial puede ofreceros.

TEXT.English: You have failed the quest of the Harbormaster
TEXT.French: Vous avez échoué dans la quête du Maître de port
TEXT.German: Der Quest "Der Hafenmeister" ist gescheitert.
TEXT.Italian: Hai fallito nell'impresa dell'Armatore.
TEXT.Spanish: La misión El práctico del puerto ha fracasado.

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must construct %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ports[COLOR_REVERT] in your various coastal cities. You will also have to build %d2 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you reach the Industrial Era without having met the conditions.
TEXT.French: [PARAGRAPH:1]Pour compléter cette quête, vous devez construire %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ports[COLOR_REVERT] in vos Ville côtières. Il vous faut également construire %d2 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravelles[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Vous échouerez cette quête si une civilisation rivale y arrive avant vous, ou si vous atteignez l'Ere industriele sans avoir rempli les conditions.
TEXT.German: [PARAGRAPH:1]Um diesen Quest zu vollenden must Du %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Seehäfen[COLOR_REVERT] in Deinen Küstenstädten bauen. Du wirst außerdem %d2 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Karavellen[COLOR_REVERT] errichten müssen.[PARAGRAPH:1]Der Quest wird scheitern, wenn eine andere Zivilisation ihn zuerst vollendet oder Du die Industrielle Ära erreichst, bevor die Bedingungen erfüllt sind.
TEXT.Italian: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must construct %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ports[COLOR_REVERT] in your various coastal cities. You will also have to build %d2 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you reach the Industrial Era without having met the conditions.
TEXT.Spanish: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must construct %d1 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Ports[COLOR_REVERT] in your various coastal cities. You will also have to build %d2 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you reach the Industrial Era without having met the conditions.

TEXT.English: Use our advantage to boost the seamanship of our current and future Naval units
TEXT.French: Utiliser notre avantage pour augmenter les capacités de nos unités navales actuelles et futures.
TEXT.German: Setzt unseren Vorteil ein, um unsere momentanen und zukünftigen Marineeinheiten zu verbessern.
TEXT.Italian: Usa il nostro vantaggio per aumentare l'efficacia marinara delle nostre unità navali attuali e future.
TEXT.Spanish: Que nuestra ventaja se utilice para mejorar la capacidad de nuestras unidades navales actuales y futuras.

TEXT.English: Our trade empire should be leveraged in to producing lots of wealth.
TEXT.French: Notre empire commercial devrait produire beaucoup de richesses.
TEXT.German: Unser Handelsimperium sollte uns einigen Wohlstand verschaffen.
TEXT.Italian: Bisognerebbe spingere il nostro impero commerciale a produrre molte ricchezze.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestro imperio comercial debe ser explotado para obtener abundantes riquezas.

TEXT.English: Our ship captains gain extra experience, enabling them to better navigate.
TEXT.French: Nos capitaines de navire gagnent de l'expérience supplémentaire qui leur permet de mieux naviguer.
TEXT.German: Unsere Schiffskapitäne bekommen zusätzliche Erfahrung, so dass sie besser navigieren können.
TEXT.Italian: I capitani delle nostre navi guadagnano più esperienza, diventando più bravi a navigare.
TEXT.Spanish: Nuestros capitanes de barco obtienen más experiencia, lo que les permite navegar mejor.

TEXT.English: One of our ships has been lost at sea during heavy storm.
TEXT.French: Un de nos navires a disparu en mer pendant une grosse Tempête.
TEXT.German: Eines unserer Schiffe ging in einem schweren Sturm auf der See verloren.
TEXT.Italian: One of our ships has been lost at sea during heavy storm.
TEXT.Spanish: One of our ships has been lost at sea during heavy storm.

TEXT.English: Inform the sailors' families about their losses.
TEXT.French: Informez les familles des marins de ce drame.
TEXT.German: Informieren Sie die Familien der Matrosen über ihren Verlust.
TEXT.Italian: Inform the sailors' families about their losses.
TEXT.Spanish: Inform the sailors' families about their losses.

TEXT.English: One of our ships has sank after trying to navigate through treacherous coastal reef.
TEXT.French: Un de nos navires s'est échoué en essayant de naviguer à travers des récifs.
TEXT.German: Eines unserer Schiffe sank beim Versuch ein tückisches Küstenriff zu umfahren.
TEXT.Italian: One of our ships has sank after trying to navigate through treacherous coastal reef.
TEXT.Spanish: One of our ships has sank after trying to navigate through treacherous coastal reef.

TEXT.English: Inform the sailors' families about their losses.
TEXT.French: Informez les familles des marins de ce drame.
TEXT.German: Informieren Sie die Familien der Matrosen über ihren Verlust.
TEXT.Italian: Inform the sailors' families about their losses.
TEXT.Spanish: Inform the sailors' families about their losses.

TEXT.English: One of our ships has gotten stuck on reef after trying to navigate through treacherous coastal waters. Sailors managed to save it from sinking but it will take some time to set the ship free from the reef and fix the ship hull.
TEXT.French: Un de nos navires s'est accroché à un récif en essayant de naviguer dans des eaux côtières traîtres. Les marins ont réussi à sauver le navire, mais il va falloir du temps pour réparer la coque et le sortir des récifs.
TEXT.German: Eines unserer Schiffe ist auf ein Riff gefahren, nachdem es versucht hatte durch tükische Küstengewässer zu fahren. Den Matrosen ist es gelungen, das Schiff vor dem Untergang zu bewahren, doch wird es eine Weile dauern, bis es vom Riff befreit und der Rumpf repariert ist.
TEXT.Italian: One of our ships has gotten stuck on reef after trying to navigate through treacherous coastal waters. Sailors managed to save it from sinking but it will take some time to set the ship free from the reef and fix the ship hull.
TEXT.Spanish: One of our ships has gotten stuck on reef after trying to navigate through treacherous coastal waters. Sailors managed to save it from sinking but it will take some time to set the ship free from the reef and fix the ship hull.

TEXT.English: Repair the ship and get it back to course as soon as possible.
TEXT.French: Réparez le navire et remettez-le à flot dès que possible.
TEXT.German: Repariert das Schiff und bringt es so schnell wie möglich wieder auf Kurs.
TEXT.Italian: Repair the ship and get it back to course as soon as possible.
TEXT.Spanish: Repair the ship and get it back to course as soon as possible.

TEXT.English: A %s4_civ_adjective druids are making pilgrims to %s1_civ_adjective Stonehenge.
TEXT.French: Des druides %s4_civ_adjective guident des pélerins jusqu'au site %s1_civ_adjective de Stonehenge.
TEXT.German: Ein %s4_civ_adjective Druide macht eine Pilgerreise zum %s1_civ_adjective Stonehenge.

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective druids have asked permission to make pilgrim to Stonehenge. What should we do?
TEXT.French: Des druides %s1_civ_adjective ont demandé la permission de faire un pélerinage jusqu'à Stonehenge. Que devons-mous faire?
TEXT.German: %s1_civ_adjective Druiden haben um Erlaubnis gefragt nach Stonehenge zu pilgern. Was sollen wir tun?
TEXT.Italian: %s1_civ_adjective druids have asked permission to make pilgrim to Stonehenge. What should we do?
TEXT.Spanish: %s1_civ_adjective druids have asked permission to make pilgrim to Stonehenge. What should we do?

TEXT.English: Allow the druids to visit the site and allow them to perform their rituals as they please.
TEXT.French: Permettre aux druides de visiter le site et de réaliser leurs rituels à leur guise.
TEXT.German: Erlaube den Druiden die Stätte zu besichtigen und alle Rituale nach ihren Wünschen auszuführen
TEXT.Italian: Allow the druids to visit the site and allow them to perform their rituals as they please.
TEXT.Spanish: Allow the druids to visit the site and allow them to perform their rituals as they please.

TEXT.English: Allow them to visit the site but after that force them to stay in our city. We could use such religious people.
TEXT.French: Permettre aux druides de visiter le site, puis convainquez-les de rester dans notre ville. Nous pourrions avoir besoins de ces religieux.
TEXT.German: Erlaube ihnen die Städte zu besichtigen, doch zwinge sie danach in unserer Stadt zu bleiben. Wir können solche religiösen Leute gebrauchen.
TEXT.Italian: Allow them to visit the site but after that force them to stay in our city. We could use such religious people.
TEXT.Spanish: Allow them to visit the site but after that force them to stay in our city. We could use such religious people.

TEXT.English: When they get to the Stonehenge sacrifice them all! That's what they are here for! Plunder their valuables too!
TEXT.French: Lorsque qu'ils seront à Stonehenge, sacrificiez-les tous! Ils viennent pour cela de tout façon! Piller leurs affaires également!
TEXT.German: Wenn sie Stonhenge erreichen, so opfere sie alle! Dafür sind sie da! Und nehmt ihnen ihre Wertgegenstände!
TEXT.Italian: When they get to the Stonehenge sacrifice them all! That's what they are here for! Plunder their valuables too!
TEXT.Spanish: When they get to the Stonehenge sacrifice them all! That's what they are here for! Plunder their valuables too!

TEXT.English: Group of thieves have plundered Treasury in %s2_city!
TEXT.French: Un Groupe de voleurs a pillé le trésor de %s2_city!
TEXT.German: Eine Diebesgruppe hat die Schatzkammer in %s2_city geplündert!
TEXT.Italian: Group of thieves have plundered Treasury in %s2_city!
TEXT.Spanish: Group of thieves have plundered Treasury in %s2_city!

TEXT.English: Bold thieves have robbed our Treasury in %s2_city! Treasury guards in duty were silently killed before the robbery and city guards were distracted while the thieves with the gold vanished to areas outside our Capital.
TEXT.French: Des voleurs ont réussi à piller notre trésor à %s2_city! Les gardes en faction ont été tués en silence avant le vol, et les garde des ville ont été distraits pendant que les voleurs filaient avec leur butin.
TEXT.German: Wagemütige Diebe haben unsere Schatzkammer in %s2_city ausgeraubt! Die Wächter wurden vor dem Einbruch lautlos getötet und die Stadtwache wurde abgelenkt während die Diebe in Regionen außerhalb der Hauptstadt verschwanden.
TEXT.Italian: Bold thieves have robbed our Treasury in %s2_city! Treasury guards in duty were silently killed before the robbery and city guards were distracted while the thieves with the gold vanished to areas outside our Capital.
TEXT.Spanish: Bold thieves have robbed our Treasury in %s2_city! Treasury guards in duty were silently killed before the robbery and city guards were distracted while the thieves with the gold vanished to areas outside our Capital.

TEXT.English: None of the thieves were captured? Issue price on their heads and increase city taxes to cover the losses!
TEXT.French: Aucun de ces voleurs n'a été capturé ? Mettez leurs têtes à prix et augmentez les taxe de la ville pour convrir les pertes!
TEXT.German: Keiner der Diebe wurde gefangen? Setze Kopfgelder auf sie aus und erhöhe die Steuern in der Stadt um den Verlust auszugleichen!
TEXT.Italian: None of the thieves were captured? Issue price on their heads and increase city taxes to cover the losses!
TEXT.Spanish: None of the thieves were captured? Issue price on their heads and increase city taxes to cover the losses!

TEXT.English: I want those thieves brought to justice dead or alive! Send troops to search the nearby towns and bribe people to get as much information about this thief group as possible and when captured, publicly execute them! Hire new spies as well so that this can't happen again!
TEXT.French: Je veux que ces Voleurs soient jugés, mort ou vifs! Envoyez des troupes dans les villes voisines et trouvez-les par tous les moyens ! Executez-les sur la place publique ! et engagez de nouveaux espions, pour que cela ne se reproduise pas!
TEXT.German: Diese Diebe sollen ihre gerechte Strafe erhalten, tot oder lebendig! Sende Suchtruppen in die umliegenden Gemeinden und besteche Leute um möglichst viele Informationen über diese Diebesgruppe zu sammeln. Wenn wir sie erwischt haben, werden sie öffentlich hingerichtet. Und lerne neue Spione an, so dass so etwas nie wieder geschehen kann!
TEXT.Italian: I want those thieves brought to justice dead or alive! Send troops to search the nearby towns and bribe people to get as much information about this thief group as possible and when captured, publicly execute them! Hire new spies as well so that this can't happen again!
TEXT.Spanish: I want those thieves brought to justice dead or alive! Send troops to search the nearby towns and bribe people to get as much information about this thief group as possible and when captured, publicly execute them! Hire new spies as well so that this can't happen again!

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective scientists in %s2_city have made a discovery! They've found fullerenes, a new form of carbon molecules.
TEXT.French: Les scientifiques %s1_civ_adjective de %s2_city ont fait une découverte! Il ont trouvé le fullerène, une nouvelle forme cristaline des molécules de carbone.
TEXT.German: Die %s1_civ_adjective Forscher in %s2_city haben eine Entdeckung gemacht! Sie haben Fullerene gefunden, eine neue Form von Kohlenstoffmolekülen.
TEXT.Italian: The %s1_civ_adjective scientists in %s2_city have made a discovery! They've found fullerenes, a new form of carbon molecules.
TEXT.Spanish: The %s1_civ_adjective scientists in %s2_city have made a discovery! They've found fullerenes, a new form of carbon molecules.

TEXT.English: The scientists in %s2_city have discovered fullerenes, a new form of carbon molecules! They say this will boost research on different fields and possibly is a breakthrough towards nanotechnology.
TEXT.French: Nos scientifique de %s2_city ont découvert le fullerène, une nouvelle forme des molécules de carbone! Ils affirment que cela va révolutionner nos recherches et créér une grande avancée dans le domaine des nanotechnologies.
TEXT.German: Die Forscher in %s2_city haben Fullerene entdeckt, eine neue Form von Kohlenstoffmolekülen! Sie behaupten, das wird der Forschung in verschiedenen Feldern einen Schub geben und möglicherweise den Durchbruch in Richtung Nanotechnologie bedeuten.
TEXT.Italian: The scientists in %s2_city have discovered fullerenes, a new form of carbon molecules! They say this will boost research on different fields and possibly is a breakthrough towards nanotechnology.
TEXT.Spanish: The scientists in %s2_city have discovered fullerenes, a new form of carbon molecules! They say this will boost research on different fields and possibly is a breakthrough towards nanotechnology.

TEXT.English: Recommend these brilliant scientists for a Nobel prize!
TEXT.French: Recommendez ces brillants scientifique pour les Prix Nobel!
TEXT.German: Schlagt diese genialen Wissenschaftler für den Nobelpreis vor!
TEXT.Italian: Recommend these brilliant scientists for a Nobel prize!
TEXT.Spanish: Recommend these brilliant scientists for a Nobel prize!

TEXT.English: The %s1_civ_adjective scientists in %s2_city have discovered first artificial element with their accelerator!
TEXT.French: Les scientifique %s1_civ_adjective de %s2_city ont découvert le premier élément artificiel avec leur accélérateur!
TEXT.German: Die %s1_civ_adjective Wissenschaftler in %s2_city haben mit ihrem Teilchenbeschleuniger das erste künstliche Element erschaffen!
TEXT.Italian: The %s1_civ_adjective scientists in %s2_city have discovered first artificial element with their accelerator!
TEXT.Spanish: The %s1_civ_adjective scientists in %s2_city have discovered first artificial element with their accelerator!

TEXT.English: The scientists in %s2_city have discovered first artificial element with the accelerator! More elements might be found in near future now that the methods to create them have been proven.
TEXT.French: Nos scientifiques de %s2_city ont découvert le premier élément artificiel avec un accélérateur à particules! d'autres éléments pourraient être découvert dans un futur proche, maintenant que la méthodologie pour leur création a été prouvée.
TEXT.German: Die Wissenschaftler in %s2_city haben mit ihrem Teilchenbeschleuniger das erste künstliche Element erschaffen! Jetzt, wo die Methode etabliert ist, könnten weitere künstliche Elemente gefunden werden.
TEXT.Italian: The scientists in %s2_city have discovered first artificial element with the accelerator! More elements might be found in near future now that the methods to create them have been proven.
TEXT.Spanish: The scientists in %s2_city have discovered first artificial element with the accelerator! More elements might be found in near future now that the methods to create them have been proven.

TEXT.English: Congratulate the scientists and send more researchers to this facility!
TEXT.French: Félicitez les scientifiques et envoyez d'autres chercheurs dans cette faculté!
TEXT.German: Gratuliere den Wissenschaftlern und schicke mehr Forscher in diese Einrichtung!
TEXT.Italian: Congratulate the scientists and send more researchers to this facility!
TEXT.Spanish: Congratulate the scientists and send more researchers to this facility!

TEXT.English: Black Death plague epidemic has broken out amongst %s1_civ_adjective people, originating in the city of %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Une épidémie de la Peste Noire a été découverte auprès du peuple %s1_civ_adjective, avec comme origine la Ville de %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Die Schwarze Pest ist ausgebrochen bei dem %s1_civ_adjective Volk, der Ursprung liegt in der Stadt %s2_city.
TEXT.Italian: Black Death plague epidemic has broken out amongst %s1_civ_adjective people, originating in the city of %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Black Death plague epidemic has broken out amongst %s1_civ_adjective people, originating in the city of %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Black Death plague epidemic has struck hard at the people of %s2_city. Most have fallen ill and many are dying.
TEXT.French: Une épidémie de Peste Noire a touché le peuple de %s2_city. La plupart sont tombé malades, et beaucoup en sont morts.
TEXT.German: Die Schwarze Pest hat die Menschen in %s2_city hart getroffen. Die meisten sind krank und viele sterben.
TEXT.Italian: Black Death plague epidemic has struck hard at the people of %s2_city. Most have fallen ill and many are dying.
TEXT.Spanish: Black Death plague epidemic has struck hard at the people of %s2_city. Most have fallen ill and many are dying.

TEXT.English: Spend whatever is necessary to quarrantine the city.
TEXT.French: Dépenser tout l'argent nécessaire pour mettre la ville en quarantaine.
TEXT.German: Tut, was immer notwendig ist, um die Stadt unter Quarantäne zu stellen.
TEXT.Italian: Spendi ciò che serve per mettere la città in quarantena.
TEXT.Spanish: No escatimemos gastos en declarar la ciudad en cuarentena.

TEXT.English: If only we had knowledge of Medicine!
TEXT.French: Si seulement nous avions découvert la médecine !
TEXT.German: Wenn wir uns nur auf dem Gebiet der Medizin auskennen würden!
TEXT.Italian: Se solo conoscessimo la Medicina!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Si supiéramos algo de medicina!

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]The plague spreads to some nearby cities and reduces their population by %d1
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]La peste se propage aux villes voisines et réduit leur population de %d1
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Die Pest breitet sich in einigen Nachbarstädten aus und reduziert ihre Bevölkerung um %d1
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]The plague spreads to some nearby cities and reduces their population by %d1
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]The plague spreads to some nearby cities and reduces their population by %d1

TEXT.English: The plague has struck %s1_city.
TEXT.French: La Peste a frappé %s1_city.
TEXT.German: Die Pest verbreitet sich in %s1_city.
TEXT.Italian: The plague has struck %s1_city.
TEXT.Spanish: The plague has struck %s1_city.

TEXT.English: Smallpox epidemic has broken out amongst %s1_civ_adjective people, originating in the city of %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Une épidémie de Variole a été découverte auprès du peuple %s1_civ_adjective, avec comme origine la Ville de %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Die Pocken sind ausgebrochen bei dem %s1_civ_adjective Volk, der Ursprung liegt in der Stadt %s2_city.
TEXT.Italian: Smallpox epidemic has broken out amongst %s1_civ_adjective people, originating in the city of %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Smallpox epidemic has broken out amongst %s1_civ_adjective people, originating in the city of %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Smallpox epidemic has struck hard at the people of %s2_city. Most have fallen ill and many are dying.
TEXT.French: Une épidémie de Variole a durement frappé le peuple de %s2_city. La plupart sont tombé malades, et beaucoup en sont morts.
TEXT.German: Die Pocken haben die Menschen in %s2_city hart getroffen. Die meisten sind krank und viele sterben.
TEXT.Italian: Smallpox epidemic has struck hard at the people of %s2_city. Most have fallen ill and many are dying.
TEXT.Spanish: Smallpox epidemic has struck hard at the people of %s2_city. Most have fallen ill and many are dying.

TEXT.English: Spend whatever is necessary to quarrantine the city.
TEXT.French: Dépenser tout l'argent nécessaire pour mettre la ville en quarantaine.
TEXT.German: Tut, was immer notwendig ist, um die Stadt unter Quarantäne zu stellen.
TEXT.Italian: Spendi ciò che serve per mettere la città in quarantena.
TEXT.Spanish: No escatimemos gastos en declarar la ciudad en cuarentena.

TEXT.English: If only we had knowledge of Medicine!
TEXT.French: Si seulement nous avions découvert la médecine !
TEXT.German: Wenn wir uns nur auf dem Gebiet der Medizin auskennen würden!
TEXT.Italian: Se solo conoscessimo la Medicina!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Si supiéramos algo de medicina!

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]The smallpox spreads to some nearby cities and reduces their population by %d1
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]La Variole se propage aux villes voisines et réduit leur population de %d1
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Die Pocken breiten sich in einigen Nachbarstädten aus und reduzieren ihre Bevölkerung um %d1
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]The smallpox spreads to some nearby cities and reduces their population by %d1
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]The smallpox spreads to some nearby cities and reduces their population by %d1

TEXT.English: The smallpox has struck %s1_city.
TEXT.French: La Variole a frappé %s1_city.
TEXT.German: Die Pocken haben die Stadt %s1_city befallen.
TEXT.Italian: The smallpox has struck %s1_city.
TEXT.Spanish: The smallpox has struck %s1_city.

TEXT.English: An explosion has destroyed the Oil Refinery in the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Une explosion a détuit la Raffinerie de Pétrole de la Ville %s1_civ_adjective de %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Eine Explosion hat die Ölraffinerie in der %s1_civ_adjective Stadt %s2_city zerstört.
TEXT.Italian: An explosion has destroyed the Oil Refinery in the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: An explosion has destroyed the Oil Refinery in the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city.

TEXT.English: A careless worker mixed wrong chemicals at the Oil Refinery in %s2_city causing a huge explosion which totally destroyed the facility. Several nearby industrial cityblocks were damaged and dangerous chemicals were spread to environment.
TEXT.French: Un Ouvrier imprudent a mélangé des produits chimique incompatibles dans la Raffinerie de Prétrole de %s2_city, provoquant une énorme explosion qui a totallement détruit l'installation. Des logements à proximité ont été également endommagés et des produits toxiques se sont déversés dans la nature.
TEXT.German: Ein achtloser Arbeiter hat in der Ölraffinerie in %s2_city die falschen Chemikalien gemischt und dabei eine riesige Explosion hervorgerufen, die die Anlage völlig zerstört hat. Verschiedene Industrieanlagen in der Umgebung wurden ebenfalls in Mitleidenschaft gezogen und gefährliche Chemikalien in die Umwelt freigesetzt.
TEXT.Italian: A careless worker mixed wrong chemicals at the Oil Refinery in %s2_city causing a huge explosion which totally destroyed the facility. Several nearby industrial cityblocks were damaged and dangerous chemicals were spread to environment.
TEXT.Spanish: A careless worker mixed wrong chemicals at the Oil Refinery in %s2_city causing a huge explosion which totally destroyed the facility. Several nearby industrial cityblocks were damaged and dangerous chemicals were spread to environment.

TEXT.English: Organize a rebuilding effort and clean up the chemicals.
TEXT.French: Organisez un projet de reconstruction et de nettoyage de la pollution.
TEXT.German: Organisiere den Wiederaufbau und entsorge die Chemikalien.
TEXT.Italian: Organize a rebuilding effort and clean up the chemicals.
TEXT.Spanish: Organize a rebuilding effort and clean up the chemicals.

TEXT.English: Clean up the chemicals from the environment.
TEXT.French: nettoyez la pollution générée par ces produit toxiques.
TEXT.German: Reinige die Umwelt von den Chemikalien.
TEXT.Italian: Clean up the chemicals from the environment.
TEXT.Spanish: Clean up the chemicals from the environment.

TEXT.English: We are too pressed to spare any attention to this accident.
TEXT.French: Nous avons mieux à faire que de porter notre attention sur cet accident.
TEXT.German: Wir haben einfach zu viel zu tun, um uns um diesen Unfall kümmern zu können.
TEXT.Italian: We are too pressed to spare any attention to this accident.
TEXT.Spanish: We are too pressed to spare any attention to this accident.

TEXT.English: News reports claim that UFOs have been sighted near the Army Base in the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city. People are flocking to the site with cameras as they are trying to get a glimpse of these UFOs.
TEXT.French: Des Informateurs affirment que des Ovnis ont été repérés près de la base militaire %s1_civ_adjective de %s2_city. Les gens ont envahi le site avec des appareils photo dans l'espoir de pouvoir apercevoir et prouver leur existence.
TEXT.German: Die Nachrichten berichten, dass in der Nähe der Armeestation der %s1_civ_adjective Stadt %s2_city UFOs gesichtet worden sind. Die Menschen strömen mit ihren Kameras dorthin um einen Blick auf diese Ufos zu erhaschen.
TEXT.Italian: News reports claim that UFOs have been sighted near the Army Base in the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city. People are flocking to the site with cameras as they are trying to get a glimpse of these UFOs.
TEXT.Spanish: News reports claim that UFOs have been sighted near the Army Base in the %s1_civ_adjective city of %s2_city. People are flocking to the site with cameras as they are trying to get a glimpse of these UFOs.

TEXT.English: News report about UFOs near the %s2_city has attracted lots of unwanted attention to our Secret Army Base. Tourists, foreign agents and news reporters are rushing to the site with their cameras as they're trying to get see what we are hiding in our base. What should we do now?
TEXT.French: Des Informations concernant des Ovnis près de %s2_city ont attiré une attention non souhaité sur notre base secrète militaire. Touristes, agents étranger et journalistes se ruent vers le site avec leurs appareils photos, essayant de voir ce qu'il se passe dans notre base. Que devons-nous faire maintenant?
TEXT.German: Die Nachrichtenberichte über UFOs in der Nähe von %s2_city haben eine Menge unerwünschte Aufmerksamkeit auf unsere geheime Armeebasis gezogen. Toristen, ausländische Agenten und Nachrichtenreporter eilen mit ihren Kameras dorthin und versuchen herauszufinden, was wir in unserer Basis verbergen. Was sollen wir tun?
TEXT.Italian: News report about UFOs near the %s2_city has attracted lots of unwanted attention to our Secret Army Base. Tourists, foreign agents and news reporters are rushing to the site with their cameras as they're trying to get see what we are hiding in our base. What should we do now?
TEXT.Spanish: News report about UFOs near the %s2_city has attracted lots of unwanted attention to our Secret Army Base. Tourists, foreign agents and news reporters are rushing to the site with their cameras as they're trying to get see what we are hiding in our base. What should we do now?

TEXT.English: Interrogate and shoot anyone who wanders inside our base area. In public release fake reports how these people got killed while wandering in weapon testing range. It should keep the public away from the area and our secret projects will be kept in secret.
TEXT.French: Interrogez et tirez sur tous ceux qui s'aventurent à l'intérieur de notre base. Publiquement, ces personnes auront été tuées en se promenant sur un champ de mines. Cela devrait dissuader les curieux et garder nos projets secrets.
TEXT.German: Befrage und erschieße dann jeden, der innerhalb des Areals der Basis herumläuft. Fälsche dann einen Report für die Öffentlichkeit, der beschreibt, wie diese Menschen getötet wurden, als sie durch die Waffentestzone liefen. Damit sollte die Öffentlichkeit die Gegend meiden und unsere geheimen Projekte bleiben geheim.
TEXT.Italian: Interrogate and shoot anyone who wanders inside our base area. In public release fake reports how these people got killed while wandering in weapon testing range. It should keep the public away from the area and our secret projects will be kept in secret.
TEXT.Spanish: Interrogate and shoot anyone who wanders inside our base area. In public release fake reports how these people got killed while wandering in weapon testing range. It should keep the public away from the area and our secret projects will be kept in secret.

TEXT.English: Tighten security and gather information about everyone who approaches our base without proper authorization. Do not acknowledge any of the so called "UFO"-sightings but let the people photograph the area from distance.
TEXT.French: Augmentez la sécurité et récupérer des informations sur tous ceux qui s'approchent de la base sans autorisation. Démentez toutes informations concernant ces soi-disants Ovnis, mais laissez les gens photographier la zone de loin.
TEXT.German: Erhöhe die Sicherheitsmaßnahmen und sammle Informationen über jeden, der sich unserer Basis ohne unsere Autorisierung nähert. Bestätigt keine dieser "UFO-Sichtungen" aber lasst die Menschen die Stelle aus der Ferne fotografieren.
TEXT.Italian: Tighten security and gather information about everyone who approaches our base without proper authorization. Do not acknowledge any of the so called "UFO"-sightings but let the people photograph the area from distance.
TEXT.Spanish: Tighten security and gather information about everyone who approaches our base without proper authorization. Do not acknowledge any of the so called "UFO"-sightings but let the people photograph the area from distance.

TEXT.English: Build new camouflaged main base area, move all research projects there and then open up the old base as tourist attraction. Make some fake radioactive alien items and let the public "see" that we have nothing to hide.
TEXT.French: Construisez une nouvelle base secrète dans une autre zone et déplacez tous les projets à-bas. Ensuite, ouvrez l'ancienne base comme atraction touristique. Fabriquez quelques objets radioactifs 'aliens' et montrez ainsi au public que nous n'avons rien à cacher.
TEXT.German: Erbaut eine neue getarnte Hauptbasis, bringt alle Forschungsprojekte dorthin und eröffnet die alte Basis als Touristenattraktion. Baut ein paar gefälschte radioaktive Alien-Geräte lasst die Öffentlichkeit "sehen", dass wir nichts zu verbergen haben.
TEXT.Italian: Build new camouflaged main base area, move all research projects there and then open up the old base as tourist attraction. Make some fake radioactive alien items and let the public "see" that we have nothing to hide.
TEXT.Spanish: Build new camouflaged main base area, move all research projects there and then open up the old base as tourist attraction. Make some fake radioactive alien items and let the public "see" that we have nothing to hide.

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Light Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units]. A source of Iron will be required.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization is operating the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Monarchy[COLOR_REVERT] civic.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you arrive at the Middle Ages without having met the conditions.
TEXT.French: [PARAGRAPH:1]Pour Terminer cette Quête, vous devez entraîner %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT][NUM1:Spadassin:Spadassins] Léger[COLOR_REVERT]. du Fer sera nécessaire.[PARAGRAPH:1]Une récompense supplémentaire sera disponible si votre Civilisation a adopté la [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Monarchie[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]La quête sera un échec si une Civilisation rivale la rempli avant vous, ou si vous parvenez au Moyen Age avant d'avoir rempli toutes les conditions.
TEXT.German: [PARAGRAPH:1]Um diesen Quest zu vollenden, musst Du %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Leichte Schwertkämpfer[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units]ausbilden. Zugang zu Eisen wird benötigt.[PARAGRAPH:1]Eine zusätzliche Belohnung wird verfügar sein, wenn Du die Staatsform [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Monarchie[COLOR_REVERT] betreibst.[PARAGRAPH:1]Der Quest wird scheitern, wenn eine andere Zivilisation ihn zuerst vollendet oder Du das Mittelalter erreichst, bevor die Bedingungen erfüllt sind.
TEXT.Italian: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Light Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units]. A source of Iron will be required.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization is operating the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Monarchy[COLOR_REVERT] civic.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you arrive at the Middle Ages without having met the conditions.
TEXT.Spanish: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Light Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT] [NUM1:unit:units]. A source of Iron will be required.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization is operating the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Monarchy[COLOR_REVERT] civic.[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you arrive at the Middle Ages without having met the conditions.

TEXT.English: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knights[COLOR_REVERT] units.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization is operating in the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]State Church[COLOR_REVERT] civic.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization controls [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you discover advanced firearms ([COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Military Tradition[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rifling[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Railroad[COLOR_REVERT] technologies) without having met the conditions.
TEXT.French: [PARAGRAPH:1]Pour Terminer cette Quête, vous devez entraîner %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chevaliers[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]Une récompense supplémentaire sera disponible si votre Civilisation a adopté la doctrine [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Eglise d'Etat[COLOR_REVERT] .[PARAGRAPH:1]Une récompense supplémentaire sera également disponible si votre Civilisation possède [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]La quête sera un échec si une Civilisation rivale la rempli avant vous, ou si vous parvenez à découvrir les armes à feu ([COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Tradition Militaire[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Fusil[COLOR_REVERT], ou [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Chemin de Fer[COLOR_REVERT]) avant d'avoir rempli toutes les conditions.
TEXT.German: [PARAGRAPH:1]Um diesen Quest zu vollenden, musst Du %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ritter[COLOR_REVERT] ausbilden.[PARAGRAPH:1]Eine zusätzliche Belohnung wird verfügar sein, wenn Du die Staatsform [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Staatskirche[COLOR_REVERT] betreibst.[PARAGRAPH:1]Eine zusätzliche Belohnung wird verfügar sein, wenn Deine Zivilisation das [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT] kontrolliert.[PARAGRAPH:1]Der Quest wird scheitern, wenn eine andere Zivilisation ihn zuerst vollendet oder Du fortgeschrittene Feuerwaffen erforschst ([COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Militärische Tradition[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Gewehrbau[COLOR_REVERT], oder [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Eisenbahn[COLOR_REVERT]) bevor die Bedingungen erfüllt sind.
TEXT.Italian: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knights[COLOR_REVERT] units.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization is operating in the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]State Church[COLOR_REVERT] civic.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization controls [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you discover advanced firearms ([COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Military Tradition[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rifling[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Railroad[COLOR_REVERT] technologies) without having met the conditions.
TEXT.Spanish: [PARAGRAPH:1]To complete this quest, you must train %d1 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Knights[COLOR_REVERT] units.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization is operating in the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]State Church[COLOR_REVERT] civic.[PARAGRAPH:1]An additional reward option will be available if your civilization controls [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s2_building[COLOR_REVERT].[PARAGRAPH:1]You will fail this quest if a rival civilization completes it first, or if you discover advanced firearms ([COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Military Tradition[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Rifling[COLOR_REVERT], or [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Railroad[COLOR_REVERT] technologies) without having met the conditions.

TEXT.English: Accident has happened during weather control test! A cloud of nanites which was designed for controlling local weather patterns malfunctioned during test and now these nanites are destroying environment instead of improving it!
TEXT.French: Un Accident s'est produit durant un test de contrôle météorologique! Un nuage de nanites conçu pour contrôler la météo locale a mal fonctionné et est en train de détruire l'environnement au lieu de l'améliorer!
TEXT.German: Während eines Wetterkontrollexperiments ist ein Unfall geschehen! Eine Wolke von Naniten, die eigentlich das örtliche Wetter kontrollieren sollten hatten im Test eine Fehlfunktion und zerstören nun die Umwelt statt sie zu verbessern!
TEXT.Italian: Accident has happened during weather control test! A cloud of nanites which was designed for controlling local weather patterns malfunctioned during test and now these nanites are destroying environment instead of improving it!
TEXT.Spanish: Accident has happened during weather control test! A cloud of nanites which was designed for controlling local weather patterns malfunctioned during test and now they are out of control!

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]A dangerous number of uncontrolled [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Nanite clouds[COLOR_REVERT] units have spawned near our border.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]A nombre dangereux de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Nuages de Nanites[COLOR_REVERT] incontrolables est apparu près de nos frontières.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Eine gefährliche Zahl von unkontrollierten [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Nanitenwolken[COLOR_REVERT] sind vor unseren grenzen erschienen.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]A dangerous number of uncontrolled [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Nanite clouds[COLOR_REVERT] units have spawned near our border.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]A dangerous number of uncontrolled [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Nanite clouds[COLOR_REVERT] units have spawned near our border.

TEXT.English: We need to deploy military forces to this area immediately!
TEXT.French: Il nous faut déployer des force militaires dans cette zone immédiatement!
TEXT.German: Wir müssen sofort militärische Kräfte in diese Region abstellen!
TEXT.Italian: We need to deploy military forces to this area immediately!
TEXT.Spanish: We need to deploy military forces to this area immediately!

TEXT.English: Use any resources available and upgrade the nanites' software so that we gain control back!
TEXT.French: Utilisez toutes les ressources disponibles et mettez à jour le logiciel des nanites pour que l'on reprenne le contrôle!
TEXT.German: Verwenden Sie alle verfügbaren Ressourcen und programmieren Sie die Software der Naniten um, so dass wir sie wieder kontrollieren können!
TEXT.Italian: Use any resources available and upgrade the nanites' software so that we gain control back!
TEXT.Spanish: Use any resources available and upgrade the nanites' software so that we gain control back!

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]If we can't deploy nukes, a dangerous number of uncontrolled [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Nanite clouds[COLOR_REVERT] units have appear near our border.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Si nous ne pouvons pas déployez d'armes nucléaires, un nombre important de [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Nuages de Nanites[COLOR_REVERT] est apparu prsè de nos frontières.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Wenn wir keine Atomwaffen einsetzen können, so wird eine gefärliche Anzahl von unkontrollierten [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Nanitenwolken[COLOR_REVERT] an unseren Grenzen erscheinen.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]If we can't deploy nukes, a dangerous number of uncontrolled [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Nanite clouds[COLOR_REVERT] units have appear near our border.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]If we can't deploy nukes, a dangerous number of uncontrolled [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Nanite clouds[COLOR_REVERT] units have appear near our border.

TEXT.English: We could try nuking those clouds. Electromagnetic pulse should shutdown the nanites.
TEXT.French: Nous allons essayer d'anéantir ces nuages. Une charge Electromagnetique devrait désactiver les nanites.
TEXT.German: Wir könnten versuchen, diese Wolken mit Atomwaffen zu beschießen. Der elektromagnetische Impuls sollte sie lahmlegen.
TEXT.Italian: We could try nuking those clouds. Electromagnetic pulse should shutdown the nanites.
TEXT.Spanish: We could try nuking those clouds. Electromagnetic pulse should shutdown the nanites.

TEXT.English: Powerful storm formed.
TEXT.French: Une puissant Tempête s'est formée.
TEXT.German: Ein mächtiger Sturm hat sich formiert.
TEXT.Italian: Powerful storm formed.
TEXT.Spanish: Powerful storm formed.

TEXT.English: Let's hope our ships haven't been caught by it.
TEXT.French: Espérons que nos navires n'ont pas été attrapés.
TEXT.German: Lasst unshoffen, dass unsere Schiffe nicht hineingeraten sind.
TEXT.Italian: Let's hope our ships haven't been caught by it.
TEXT.Spanish: Let's hope our ships haven't been caught by it.

TEXT.English: One of our ships has been lost at sea during heavy storm.
TEXT.French: Un de nos navires a disparu en mer pendant une grosse Tempête.
TEXT.German: Eines unserer Schiffe ging während eines heftigen Sturmes auf hoher See verloren.
TEXT.Italian: One of our ships has been lost at sea during heavy storm.
TEXT.Spanish: One of our ships has been lost at sea during heavy storm.

TEXT.English: Inform the sailors' families about their losses.
TEXT.French: Informez les familles des marins de ce drame.
TEXT.German: Informiert die Familien der Matrosen über ihren Verlust.
TEXT.Italian: Inform the sailors' families about their losses.
TEXT.Spanish: Inform the sailors' families about their losses.

TEXT.English: One of our ships has been lost at sea during heavy storm.
TEXT.French: Un de nos navires a disparu en mer pendant une grosse Tempête.
TEXT.German: Eines unserer Schiffe ging während eines heftigen Sturmes auf hoher See verloren.
TEXT.Italian: One of our ships has been lost at sea during heavy storm.
TEXT.Spanish: One of our ships has been lost at sea during heavy storm.

TEXT.English: Inform the sailors' families about their losses.
TEXT.French: Informez les familles des marins de ce drame.
TEXT.German: Informiert die Familien der Matrosen über ihren Verlust.
TEXT.Italian: Inform the sailors' families about their losses.
TEXT.Spanish: Inform the sailors' families about their losses.

TEXT.English: One of our ships has been lost at sea during heavy storm.
TEXT.French: Un de nos navires a disparu en mer pendant une grosse Tempête.
TEXT.German: Eines unserer Schiffe ging während eines heftigen Sturmes auf hoher See verloren.
TEXT.Italian: One of our ships has been lost at sea during heavy storm.
TEXT.Spanish: One of our ships has been lost at sea during heavy storm.

TEXT.English: Inform the sailors' families about their losses.
TEXT.French: Informez les familles des marins de ce drame.
TEXT.German: Informiert die Familien der Matrosen über ihren Verlust.
TEXT.Italian: Inform the sailors' families about their losses.
TEXT.Spanish: Inform the sailors' families about their losses.

TEXT.English: %s1_civ_adjective explorers have discovered valuables buried in ruins near %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Des explorateurs %s1_civ_adjective ont découvert des biens enterrés dans des ruines près de %s2_city.
TEXT.German: %s1_civ_adjective Entdecker haben in Ruinen in der Nähe von %s2_city Wertgegenstände gefunden.
TEXT.Italian: %s1_civ_adjective explorers have discovered valuables buried in ruins near %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: %s1_civ_adjective explorers have discovered valuables buried in ruins near %s2_city.
TEXT.Finnish: %s1_civ_adjective explorers have discovered valuables buried in ruins near %s2_city.
TEXT.Hungarian: %s1_civ_adjective explorers have discovered valuables buried in ruins near %s2_city.
TEXT.Polish: %s1_civ_adjective explorers have discovered valuables buried in ruins near %s2_city.
TEXT.Russian: %s1_civ_adjective explorers have discovered valuables buried in ruins near %s2_city.
TEXT.Chinese: %s1_civ_adjective explorers have discovered valuables buried in ruins near %s2_city.
TEXT.Japanese: %s1_civ_adjective explorers have discovered valuables buried in ruins near %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Scouts exploring ruins near %s2_city have discovered a hidden treasure.
TEXT.French: Nos éclaireurs ont exploré des ruines près de %s2_city et ont trouvé un trésor caché.
TEXT.German: Entdecker habe bei der Untersuchung von Ruinen in der Nähe von %s2_city einen versteckten Schatz gefunden.
TEXT.Italian: Scouts exploring ruins near %s2_city have discovered a hidden treasure.
TEXT.Spanish: Scouts exploring ruins near %s2_city have discovered a hidden treasure.
TEXT.Finnish: Scouts exploring ruins near %s2_city have discovered a hidden treasure.
TEXT.Hungarian: Scouts exploring ruins near %s2_city have discovered a hidden treasure.
